name: TotSpot, Inc.
description: Provider of a peer-to-peer mobile marketplace designed to sell children's fashion clothing. The company's peer-to-peer mobile marketplace features an intuitive and sleek interface that provides fast, easy and safe parent-to-parent transactions, while offering an outlet for family focused communities to inspire and learn from one another, enabling users to shop and sell clothes for kids.
one_liner: Provider of a peer-to-peer mobile marketplace designed to sell children's fashion clothing. The company's peer-to-peer mobile marketplace features an intuitive and sleek interface that provides fast, easy and safe parent-to-parent transactions, while offering an outlet for family focused communities to inspire and learn from one another, enabling users to shop and sell clothes for kids.
